README.p: This extension provides aneventsnode which can be used to manage any number of events.
Also provides a calendar widget to dynamically display these events.

ol.li: After importing the extension, reload the WebPal UI.
Populate the events node with any number of events
To render the calendar, apply templates for the events node, using modeas-calendar:
The calendar widget will show up as such:
define external sources for events, such as google cal
create database storage for events, allowing for webuser-generated/maintainedevents
